ValidationRule.description: Close Date must be specified when Status is set to 'Closed - Filled' or 'Closed - Not Approved
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISBLANK( Close_Date__c ) && ( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Closed - Filled") || ISPICKVAL(Status__c , "Closed - Not Approved"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Close Date must be specified when Status is set to 'Closed.'
